item.title: PHP 不用函数翻转字符串
How to Avoid Floating Point Math Error in PHP and Python
item.description: php -r "var_dump(intval(0.58 * 100));” int(57) python3 >>>print(0.58*100)57.99999999999999 other languages http://0.30000000000000004.com how did this happen http://www.laruence.com/2013/03/26/2884.html Mathematical extensions in php and decimal module in python to avoid this php -r "var_dump(intval(bcmul('0.58', '100')));" int(58) >>> from decimal import Decimal >>> from decimal import getcontext >>> print(Decimal('0.58') * Decimal('100')) 58.00
